short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock achievements with your academic success and view them on Google Scholar!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScholarQuest tracks the data on your Google Scholar profile page and awards achievements once you reach various milestones, such as publishing 10 papers, or gaining 100 citations. Academia gamified! 

This is an open-source project. Contribute here: 
https://github.com/earlbellinger/ScholarQuest

Disclaimer: When this extension is installed, it will open your personal Google Scholar profile page and read the public data that you have displayed on it: your name, your Google Scholar profile ID number, the number of papers you have written, and the number of citations each of those papers has received. This will be used to recognize when you are on your own page, and to determine whether you have unlocked any new achievements. This information will be updated each time you visit your own Google Scholar profile. This information will be stored only within your Google Chrome user storage. It will not be shared with the developer nor with any other users.
